About Avanti International Hotel&Restaurant Supply Incorporated Avanti International Hotel&Restaurant Supply Incorporated is a Fast Food restaurant located at 650 Nw 123rd St in North Miami, FL 33168. Avanti International Hotel&Restaurant Supply Incorporated has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
